strIntroduction: Accompany us to the charming medieval town of Assisi.

strIntroduction: Take in the best of Milan’s fantastic landmarks and tourist attractions on the quick and convenient City Sightseeing hop-on/hop-off bus tour. What’s more, with this offer you can take your pick from three carefully designed bus routes to really make the most of Milan. From the beautiful Duomo to the Sforza Castle and everything in between, there is no better way to explore Europe’s most elegant city.
strTitle: City sightseeing bus tour of Milan

strIntroduction: The tour will take you around the city to discover the center of Rome. Enjoy the shopping district and the sunset at the Colosseum.

Small group Rome day tours to Tuscany featuring Montalcino, Montepulciano, Pienza and the Brunello wine region with wine tastings at celebrated wineries producing the world famous Brunello wines. Intimate day tours of the most beautiful countryside Italy has to offer travelling in air-conditioned Mercedes minivans with English-speaking drivers

strIntroduction: Visit top attractions in Venice and the islands of Murano and Burano in the Venice Lagoon in a single day. Skip the lines at St. Mark’s Basilica and the Doge’s Palace, take a boat to the islands, and see glassblowing and lace making demonstrations.

Leave Milan by high-speed train and spend the day sightseeing in Rome. After a 3.5-hour morning train journey to Rome, you’ll have the rest of the day to explore the historic city independently. Take a hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour and listen to audio commentary as you cruise around on an open-top double-decker bus to landmarks.

strIntroduction: One of our most popular tours in Venice - Small group guided Doges Palace tour with skip the line tickets!

Become acquainted with 3 classic Italian icons on a full-day tour from Florence to the Ferrari Museum, a balsamic vinegar estate, and a Parmesan cheese producer. Live the Ferrari Experience, and taste fine regional products.
Explore the Villa Barbaro, Villa Emo & Villa Malcontenta with an expert Palladian guide!

Take to the waters edge and enliven your spirit by touring the nightlife along Milan's ancient Navigli canals. These picturesque canals, which once connected the entire city, are now the heart and soul of Milanese nightlife. Come join in fun beneath the moon and stars as you explore your splendid surroundings.

strIntroduction: Find designer bargains at the amazing FoxTown Factory Stores, located just 45 minutes outside Milan, in Switzerland. On this 6-hour tour you can shop 'til you drop and enjoy discounts of 30-70 percent! Visit the beauty center or the casino on site.

strIntroduction: Discover the beautiful town of Verona, the famous setting of Shakespeare’s ‘Romeo and Juliet’, renowned as one of the most romantic Cities in Italy, and take a two hour guided walking tour through some of the most famous cultural and historic sites of the region.
Private Venice wine tours of Friuli feature two full wine tastings at celebrated wineries and scenic back roads.

strIntroduction: This is a great chance to visit one of world football's great temples. The Stadio Meazza or San Siro Stadium as is it is more commonly known is reputed to be one of the most astounding sports buildings in the world and is home to AC and Inter Milan, two of Italy's most illustrious clubs. We also tour the new home of AC Milan at Casa Milan, and discover their new state of the art museum, shop and enjoy a delicious lunch at its restaurant

Get priority entrance to Da Vinci’s Last Supper on this walking tour of Milan. Check out the hip bohemian scene of the Brera district, rub shoulders with greats at La Scala, shop in the boutique stores of Galleria Vittorio Manuele II, and much more.
strTitle: The best of Milan walking tour and DaVinci’s Last Supper: Skip the line

strIntroduction: Visit the magical Königssee in the Berchtesgaden Alps of Bavaria. Explore Germany’s third deepest lake, a fjord-like body of water, surrounded by towering rock faces. Take a boat ride on the lake, and drive along some of the most scenic Alpine roads.
Explore Salzburg, the city Mozart called home, and the countryside featured in "The Sound of Music"
Live a real-life fairytale on a trip to the storybook castles of Neuschwanstein and Linderhof!
strTitle: Neuschwanstein & Linderhof Royal Castle and Oberammergau Tour from Munich

strIntroduction: Experience the unforgettable beauty of Swabia's Nördlinger Ries. Visit Harburg Castle, an amazingly-preserved mediaeval castle never damaged by war. Wander through the streets of Rothenburg, a beautifully restored mediaeval town.

Visit the UNESCO world heritage site of the Rhine Valley, its vineyards, and picturesque little towns and villages. You'll taste the local wines on site, see the mighty mediaeval castles – and maybe even the "Lorelei", the legendary maiden of the Rhine.
Take a day to explore the romantic city of Heidelberg, coupled with the rich history of Nuremberg. Offering a bit of past and present, you're sure to have a day to remember.
“Baden-Baden is so nice you have to name it twice.” - Former U.S. President Bill Clinton

Climb aboard for a day trip experiencing Dresden with your own private bus and guide. Learn about Dresden through the ages, from the Saxon Kings to the post-communist era. And learn of the rich cultural and artistic heritages this town has to offer.
The Berlin Wall split not just the city and Germany in two but the entire world for almost 30 years. The emotional, physical and psychological scars it left behind will take generations to heal.
strTitle: Berlin Wall and Cold War Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Step inside Sachsenhauser, the concentration camp that set the standard for all those that followed. Learn of the site’s terrible history and see poignant memorials, such as the killing center, gallows, and more.
strTitle: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Visit the heart of Munich's beer and food culture, spend 3 hours sampling the best of traditional Bavarian food and beer, with an exclusive tour of the Oktoberfest Museum the best of local beer halls and the Hofbräuhaus.
strTitle: Bavarian Beer and Food Evening Tour in Munich

strIntroduction: 高品質上網分享器，給您在國外網路也能暢通無阻的體驗！取機還機超方便。

Explore all the main attractions of Berlin on a half-day guided bike tour. Explore the city’s unique history, from the Prussian Empire, to the days of the Third Reich, the city split by the Berlin Wall, and reunification after the fall of the wall.

Discover the enchanting beauty of Heidelberg and the modern vibe of Frankfurt on this comprehensive tour of both cities. Plus, not only will you be taken to the most interesting sites in these two unparalleled cities.
strTitle: Heidelberg and Frankfurt City Tour（Start from Frankfurt）

strIntroduction: Cologne Rhine Pass allows you to hop on and off along Middle Rhine, just check the timetable, make up your travel plan and enjoy the picturesque river view.
strTitle: KD RhinePass - One Day Hop On - Hop Off

strIntroduction: 一張德鐵通票（German Rail Pass FLEXI ）讓你在德國自助旅行暢通無阻。30 天內任選 3 天無限制搭乘 DB 運營的 IC、EC、ICE Sprinter、ICE 火車，甚至還能到鄰近國家玩。德鐵通票絕對是你遊覽德國最便利且必備的工具！

Discover the beers of Bamberg on this entertaining tour with a visit to an original brewery. See Bamberg Cathedral and Neue Residenz castle, hear all about the purity laws and beer witches and sample Bamberg's best beers.
strTitle: Bamberg: Private Brewery and Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Looking for an authentic experience in the evening? Still have questions for our guide that you didn’t get a chance to ask on the day tour? Then join us on a culinary sojourn through Neukölln, an up-and-coming neighbourhood far off the tourist track.
strTitle: Culinary Berlin – Local Food and Local Neighbourhoods

strIntroduction: The story of Berlin tour encompasses all that Berlin has to offer, from historical sights attesting to its harrowing past, to a modern vibrant culture that points to a thriving future.
Experience Munich by night, visit the Hofbräuhaus for dinner, and enjoy views from the Olympic Tower

Be awestruck by the Bavarian region’s beautiful glistening lakes, soaring Karwendel Mountains and charming Innsbruck with our fabulous one-day tour. Included in the tour is a visit to Swarovski’s impressive 'World of Chrystal'. Expert guides will divulge compelling facts and illustrate the highlights of the region.
strTitle: Innsbruck and the Swarovski World of Crystals

strIntroduction: Discover the palaces, lakes and gardens of the former royal city of city of Potsdam with this relaxing and informative bike tour.
strTitle: Palaces and Gardens of Potsdam Bike Tour

strIntroduction: Berlin has been at the epicentre of most world-shaping events of the past century, which has resulted in today’s wonderfully diverse city with a rich display of historical and cultural sights, buildings and memorials alluding to its chequered heritage. The double-decker, hop on-hop off Berlin Tourist Bus offers three ways to explore the German capital and discover its many sights and attractions while learning about its dramatic past. Take the Classic Tour or the Wall and Lifestyle Tour, or a tour that combines both.
Munich has a rich heritage as the city of beer, breweries, beer gardens and beer festivals
This SIM card works in 31 different countries in Europe, provides 1250MB fast mobile internet/ data plus 300 minutes calls in 31 countries in Europe.
Our ticket including Hop on - hop off bus tour and an one hour boat tour in Hamburg
strTitle: Hop on - hop off bus and boat tour

strIntroduction: On the Reeperbahn guided tour is about the heart of St. Pauli, Reeperbahn, at night. During our two-hour Reeperbahn tour you learn about particular Hamburg's St. Pauli district, with its "Geilen mile". Learn features that are only found here in the Hamburg red-light district: Sperrbezirk, street prostitution and sex shops over a length of 930 meters. You learn the Herbert Street, the crack and the Silbersackstrasse well known as the Große Freiheit.
"St. Pauli,TuttifFrutti" is our most popular tour of land gang St. Pauli.

Discover Stuttgart on a city rally with a smart electric vehicle from car2go. Solve the exciting tasks in a team and collect points along the way. On this 3-hour tour, explore the city, the picturesque Neckar river, and the vineyards.
strTitle: Stuttgart: 3-Hour City Rally by Smart Car from car2go

strIntroduction: Take a day to explore the impressive natural bounty along the German Alpine Road, coupled with a bit of history, as you take in a few sites used by the Third Reich at the height of World War II. Offering a bit of past and present, you're sure to have a day to remember.

Skip the long lines for taxis, or the hassle of navigating public transport upon arrival at either Berlin’s Tegel or Schönefeld Airport, and enjoy a private, chauffeur driven transfer to your city hotel in a stylish, comfortable, and luxurious vehicle.
strTitle: Tegel or Schönefeld Airport Transfers to Berlin Hotels

strIntroduction: Germany, Baden-Baden is a chic destination for those who fancy a dip in its famous thermal hot springs.

Reap the benefits of the Berlin WelcomeCard Museum Island with discounts on attractions and free public transport for 72 hours. Enjoy free entry to all museums and collections on Berlin's Museum Island with the Pass.

Discover Mannheim on a 2-hour guided Segway tour. The tour will take you along the Rhein and show you all that the city has to offer! Ride by the noble Lindenhof area, through the magical Waldpark, and much more.
strTitle: Segway Tour of Mannheim: Rhein, Waldpark, and Lindenhof

strIntroduction: The guide and traditional entertainment give you marvelous insights into Bavarian culture. Plus the food at Hofbrauhaus is outstanding!
strTitle: Munich by Night and Dinner at Hofbrauhaus

strIntroduction: Our Discover Berlin tour is a perfect introduction to Berlin and covers ALL the main sights worth seeing over 3.5 to 4 hours.

一張德鐵通票（German Rail Pass FLEXI ）讓你在德國自助旅行暢通無阻。30 天內任選 5 天無限制搭乘 DB 運營的 IC、EC、ICE Sprinter、ICE 火車，甚至還能到鄰近國家玩。德鐵通票絕對是你遊覽德國最便利且必備的工具！

Enjoy hassle-free travel from Frankfurt city center to Frankfurt Airport on this 1-hour Frankfurt Airport private departure transfer. Hop into your private vehicle at the designated time at your hotel or other pickup point in Frankfurt. Then, relax in air-conditioned comfort on route to the airport. Avoid potential problems on public transport and arrive feeling relaxed and ready for your flight. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

An excursion from Munich to the islands of Bavaria's Chiemsee. You will see the grand palace of King Ludwig II, a 19th-century tribute to Versailles, and enjoy the calm of the fascinating Fraueninsel, with its picturesque monastery.

Explore Bremen onboard a comfortable bus on this sighseeing tour. Discover the main attractions in the Art Nouveau district of Schwachhausen, the alternative Ostertor district, and the interesting Überseestadt neighborhood.
